body_html:
Here is the guideline to debug code in android studio: https://developer.android.com/studio/debug/.

You can use LLDB to debug your native code. If you want to debug the whole flow: java --> jni --> native, I would recommend you to use logs for debugging.
body_text:
Here is the guideline to debug code in android studio: https://developer.android.com/studio/debug/.
You can use LLDB to debug your native code. If you want to debug the whole flow: java --> jni --> native, I would recommend you to use logs for debugging.
body:
Here is the guideline to debug code in android studio: https://developer.android.com/studio/debug/.

You can use LLDB to debug your native code. If you want to debug the whole flow: java --> jni --> native, I would recommend you to use logs for debugging.
